amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of the Chief Management Officer at the US Agency for Global Media to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 258 (Roll no. 488).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 258 (Roll no. 488).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
